verses.name: Ezekiel 47:11
verses.text: But the miry places thereof and the marishes thereof shall not be healed; they shall be given to salt.

verses.name: Ezekiel 47:12
verses.text: And by the river upon the bank thereof, on this side and on that side, shall grow all trees for meat, whose leaf shall not fade, neither shall the fruit thereof be consumed: it shall bring forth new fruit according to his months, because their waters they issued out of the sanctuary: and the fruit thereof shall be for meat, and the leaf thereof for medicine.
